basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HPIV3 fusion (F) protein)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16973588]Henda virus(HeV):inhibition of virus infection in HeLa cells(IC50=20 nM);inhibition of fusion in HeLa cells(IC50=7.5 nM);human parainfluenza virus 3 (HPIV3):inhibition of virus infection in HeLa cells(IC50=500 nM);inhibition of fusion in HeLa cells(IC50=500 nM).
